channel.title: Are there any commands to make a Normal Player into a npc?
channel.description:
[u][b]Question:[/b][/u] Are there any commands to make a normal Player into a npc?
[u][b]Rephrase:[/b][/u] I am not talking about having a normal player being able to do ::pnpc. I am asking that if an Player Moderator, Admin, or Owner can transform another player into an npc. If there is not, would there be any codes to enable this command?

item.title: Are there any commands to make a Normal Player into a npc?

@NiTroo wrote:

You either need a code,but further mroe i havent seen that yet

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ALexander5 ALexander5

item.title: Are there any commands to make a Normal Player into a npc?
item.dc:creator: @slowdown slowdown
item.description:
@slowdown wrote:

Yes, just change the player rights on ::pnpc to 0 otherwise you can’t make them npc’s.

Read full topic
